title: The teacher is the voice of Truth, not the man behind the voice.
text: It is the intensity and the audacity in the setting of the Bhagavad Gita that keeps it way above any scripture in terms of its relevance, its significance.

title: Death is as sure for that which is born, as birth is for that which is dead.
text: The most certain thing in life is that we will meet with death one day. So when something is inevitable, why lament over it?
